Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/Grace
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Clark, and Addison due to, street blockage near Ashland/Grace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Clark, and Addison due to, street blockage near Ashland/Grace.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
